item.title: A Free C/C++ Static Code Analysis Tool—Cppcheck—Integrated with Jenkins
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces the installation, usage, and integration of Cppcheck with Jenkins to improve C/C++ code quality and static analysis capabilities.
